resources.string: Freyja enters with the grace of the forest, her bow slung across her back and a quiet confidence in her step, her keen eyes surveying the tavern with a hint of wilderness. A mug of the forest\'s essence, if you will. A drink that reminds me of the woods and its untamed spirit. The wilderness had its own rhythm today; a drink to reconnect with its energy sounds perfect.

string-array.name: player_freyja
string-array.item: A drink that reconnects you with the wilderness sounds just right after a day attuned to nature\'s rhythm.
Be careful, that drink might just have its own wild spirit and wander off before you take a sip.
A ranger seeking a drink that echoes the untamed. Perhaps my company could add a touch of wilderness to your evening?
